description:
The World Chess Championship 2021 is an ongoing chess match between reigning world champion Magnus Carlsen and challenger Ian Nepomniachtchi to determine the World Chess Champion. 

The full match consists of maximum 14 regular games, and a score of 7½ wins the world championship. If the score is equal after 14 games, tie-break games with faster time controls will be played. Any potential tie-break games will not be considered for this market, only the regular games (14 maximum) will be considered. 

At the time of the market's inception (December 6, 11 AM ET), there were 8 regular games completed so far, 6 of them ended with a draw, 2 of them were won by Carlsen.

If Ian Nepomniachtchi wins any of the upcoming regular games, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

------------------------------

WCC 2021 is held under the auspices of FIDE, the world chess federation, and played at Dubai Exhibition Centre, Dubai, United Arab Emirates, between 24 November and 16 December 2021.

Please read more about the championship here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Chess_Championship_2021
